article.description: Cincinnati offers little resistance, as Illinois rolls into matchup with No. 1-seeded Duke.
article.headline: Illini issue another NCAA statement
article.linkText: Illinois sends Cincinnati packing early ... again

inlines.body:
Dick Vitale's Tourney Take
Illinois shot 64 percent from the field and only turned the ball over four times. Illinois scored 49 points in the first half and turned this into a rout with eight three-pointers. Deron Williams scored 31 points and dished out seven assists with no turnovers. Teammate Dee Brown has proven to be quite solid in both tourney games with 11 assists and only two turnovers in 74 minutes.
More on Sunday's Games

article.story: CINCINNATI (AP) -- Armein Kirkland scored 22 points and Jason Maxiell added 20 to help Cincinnati beat Division II Southern Indiana 82-62 in an exhibition game Saturday night. Eric Hicks added 13 points and 18 rebounds for the Bearcats, who open the regular season Friday night against Valparaiso. Reque Newsome and Chris Thompson each scored 11 points to lead the Screaming Eagles, ranked No. 1 in the preseason Division II rankings.
